name: Shengong 'Sichou' Knife
description: This knife and others, such as the Shengong 'Qie' Knife , with the additional attribute that gives increased skinning yield actually has a 230% Yield from Skinning. This is because the additional attribute is multiplicative and not additive, making them better than the Titanium Knife or Inaris "Ventura" Knife at skinning. Unlike Throwing Knives , the Shengong 'Sichou' Knife cannot be thrown. There currently are no Workshop throwing knives.
